title: THE DEVIL ALL THE TIME Ending Explained!
author: Think Story
comment: Oddly made me more excited for THE BATMAN 🦇
I never thought I’d see pennywise being Spider-Man’s father, and Spider-Man killing Batman and the winter soldier 😂
A super satisfying scene was when Tom confronted  Robert, the pastor,  before he killed him. The slow story telling just made the scene so much better.
Notice, he doesn’t pray or really is much of a believer, yet he never got hurt or killed by the people trying to kill him. Ironic and funny that God is protecting Arvin, yet oh so satisfying.
I weirdly like how Tom Hollands character gave out justice ahaha
description:
In this video we take a deep dive, explain the ending, and review the latest netflix movie "The Devil All The Time" starring Robert Pattinson, Tom Holland, Bill Skarsgard, and Harry Melling.
